title: Could Metal Gear Solid 3 & Castlevania Show Up at E3?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.23.23
description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/kindafunny65 and use code kindafunny65 for 65% off plus free shipping!

Blessing and Tim talk about Metal Gear Solid 3 Remake & Castlevania possibly showing up at E3 and Shinji Mikami leaving Tango Gameworks.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:36 - Housekeeping
A new episode of The Blessing Show is premiering this Monday right after KFGD. Tune in right here on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames live because it’s an episode you don’t want to miss.
Tonight! Greg and Stella are hosting the 26th Annual DICE Awards, and you can watch on IGN! The awards are voted on by your favorite developers, so this is the only award show where peers recognize peers. Catch it Thursday night on IGN and Twitch!
Later today we’ll be reacting LIVE to today’s PlayStation State of Play with a Gamescast post-show breaking down everything we just saw. That’s happening today at 1pm pt on Twitch and Youtube.
